articles.author: Eoghan Moloney
articles.title: 'Worst of the pandemic behind Ireland' but WHO's Mike Ryan sounds caution on the danger of variants - Independent.ie
articles.description: The worst of the pandemic in terms of health effects is behind Ireland, and many European countries, Dr Mike Ryan of the WHO’s Health Emergencies Programme has said.
articles.content:

articles.author: Helen Collis
articles.title: EU regulator: mRNA coronavirus vaccines possibly linked to heart swelling - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The regulator’s safety committee analyzed 145 cases of myocarditis and 138 cases of pericarditis after the BioNTech/Pfizer vaccine.
